title: Top 3 Fights in Jujutsu Kaisen
author: Arpit Shrivastava
content:
Jujutsu Kaisen is renowned for its jaw-dropping fight scenes. Here are three battles that showcase the series at its best:

  1. Yuji and Nobara vs. Death Painting Brothers
  2. This fight highlights teamwork and showcases the growth of Yuji and Nobara as sorcerers.
  3. Satoru Gojo vs. Jogo
  4. A visual masterpiece, this battle demonstrates why Gojo is one of the strongest characters in the series.
  5. Yuji and Todo vs. Hanami
  6. Combining strategy and brute force, this fight is a fan favorite for its intense choreography and character development.
